findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and may allow for unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and may allow unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and may allow unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unsecured Constructor
findings.description: The constructor of a contract is public and unsecured.

findings.title: Unprotected Receive Ether function
findings.description: The Receive Ether function allows anyone to send Ether to the contract without any restrictions or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeDividends function
findings.description: The distributeDividends function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected dividendOf function
findings.description: The dividendOf function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized access or manipulation of dividend information.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawableDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawableDividendOf function is declared as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawnDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawnDividendOf function is accessible without any protection or access control, potentially allowing unauthorized users to manipulate dividend information.

findings.title: Unprotected accumulativeDividendOf function
findings.description: The accumulativeDividendOf function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unsecured and can be exploited to mint tokens without proper authorization.

findings.title: Unsecured _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unsecured and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unsecured _setBalance function
findings.description: The _setBalance function is unsecured and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper validation or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function is unprotected and can lead to unauthorized asset transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without any protection or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function
findings.description: The permit function lacks protection, which can lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The _burn function does not have any access control and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap functions (swapTokensForEth, swapAndLiquify, swapExactTokensForTokens, swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, swapTokensForExactETH, swapExactTokensForETH, swapETHForExactTokens) are unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of sensitive data.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function does not have proper protection, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function does not have any access modifiers, making it callable by anyone.
